title: An Inquiry into the Causes and Effects of the Variolae Vaccinae
description: This collection of three publications details Edward Jenner's investigations into the connection between smallpox and coxpox, and the creation of the smallpox vaccine, the world's first vaccine. - Summary by Jordan

sections.title: An Inquiry into the Causes and Effects of the Variolae Vaccinae

A Continuation of Facts and Observations relative to the Variolae Vaccinae
